channel.title: design on Imperial Blog
channel.description: Recent content in design on Imperial Blog

item.title: We Have a Logo!
item.description: Hope you enjoy the new logo! Spent quiet some time doing it and then threw all out the window!

item.title: On Biomes
item.description: Well what a year this 2020 resulted to be. Such a beautiful number ruined because COVID-19. After more than 30 days in lock down, I kept working on the game.

item.title: The Road Map
item.description: Time to share with you guys the road map of the game up to the Beta release.
